question.en: Choose 2 fetishes each. Write them down, guess them and talk about them!
question.pt: Escolham 2 fetiches cada. Anote-os, mostre ao parceiro(a) e fale sobre eles!
question.de: Wählt je 2 Fetische aus, die ihr gerne mal ausprobieren wollt.. Schreibt sie auf, erratet sie gegenseitig und sprecht darüber!

question.en: Complete the sentence:: I love that you...
question.pt: Complete a frase: Eu amo quando você...

question.en: What 3 things did you notice the first time you met? Write them down and talk about them!
question.pt: Que três coisas você notou quando me conheceu? Anote-as e fale sobre elas!
question.de: Welche 3 Dinge sind euch aufgefallen, als ihr euch das erste Mal gesehen habt? Schreibt sie auf und sprecht darüber!

question.en: The translation from German to English is: "What do you think you bring to the relationship? Does what I bring meet your expectations? If yes/no partly: In which aspects do you wish that I would contribute more? (Direction: Check whether what Partner 1 thinks to contribute is also what Partner 2 expects, or perhaps something completely different?
question.pt: O que você acha que traz para o relacionamento? O que eu trago atende às suas expectativas? Se sim/não parcialmente: Em quais aspectos você gostaria que eu contribuísse mais? (Direção: Verifique se o que o Parceiro 1 pensa em contribuir é também o que o Parceiro 2 espera, ou talvez algo completamente diferente?
question.de:
Was denkst du bringst du in die Beziehung mit ein? Entspricht, dass was ich einbringe deinen Erwartungen? Wenn ja/nein teilweise: Bei welchen Aspekten wünscht du dir, dass ich mich mehr einbringe?
(Regieanweiseung: gleicht ab, ob das was der Partner 1 denkt einzubringen auch das ist, was Partner 2 erwartet,oder vielleicht etwas völlig anderes ?
